Summary: Traveling on 10fwy east looking at cal poly Pomona and a sphere orange in color was sitting in mid air to high to be a street lamp. I slowed to about 50 mph to see what it was as I connected to the 57fwy where I got a clear look
divs: Sighting DetailsDriving to work it was 430am Friday morning I was on the 10 fwy e bound I was coming down kellogg hill I was getting in the first lane as I looked over to cal poly Pomona I noticed an orange street light that was out of place it was way to high for a light then I thought if it was off the campus building it should be red for aircrafts could see first I thought that can't be then I knew what I was looking at it was a UFO it was an orange color large in size looked like it was blendind in to the scene behind it I slowed down to about 50 so I could get a better look it stood very still as I came around to the 57 fwy s it was in the perfect angle it was a UFO just sitting still looked like it was just below the hills behind it and to me it was over cal poly farm ?
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Pomona
There were no other sightings in Pomona on or around November 19th 2009
